attributes.action: Iran is in the cross hairs of American Hawks
attributes.additional_details:
Iran is in the cross hairs of Hawks in the US that are planning regime change, nothing is going to get in their way as General Wesley Clark has mentioned in his speech "7 countries in 5 years". 

There has been a delay in getting around to Iran but they are here now. The plan to change the government of Iran is part of a oligarch plan of these Hawks who walk in the corridors of power in Washington DC.

We do not want the government of the UK to be party to this without a debate in Parliament.
attributes.background:
The drums of war are now beating for Iran. I ask the government of the United Kingdom to show restraint wait for facts. 

Keep our hands off Iran and do not give moral support to those that want to go to war against Iran without any evidence.

We need Peace in the Middle East no more wars.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/261636
